properties.name: Swagger_Json_from_Dev_Branch
properties.description:
Provide the Json from Bitbucket Dev Repo 

(https://bitbucket-eng-sjc1.cisco.com/bitbucket/projects/NEXTG/repos/be-console/browse/ui-swagger/be-console.swagger.json)

https://bitbucket-eng-sjc1.cisco.com/bitbucket/projects/NEXTG/repos/be-importexport/browse/ui-swagger/be-importexport.swagger.json

Store the Swagger Json from Bitbucket Repo and store in String
Fetch Swagger Json from the HTTP Action Using Swagger URL
Based on JsonPathQuery Fetch the Data from both swagger and Compare the results
